message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $18000.

I appreciate your time, and I'm interested in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering my budget and the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking for a more reasonable price, but I'm afraid $12000 is still below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $16000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my minimum selling price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $14000. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the product's value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, $14000 is still not my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $16500. This is as low as I can go, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to you and my minimum selling price.

I understand that you've made concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $14000. I'm willing to meet you at $14000, but I need you to understand that this is my final offer. If I don't get a good deal here, I'll have to consider buying from John.
